main event: Two bright lights were observed at Seal Beach Naval Depot in California on December 31, 1953.
interesting points: The objects were observed for approximately 3 to 4 minutes,One of the lights was described as a very bright white light, much brighter than any stars or planets,The second observation indicated that the bright light changed colors, flashing intermittently red, yellow, and blue,The object moved in a straight line with no change of speed or direction, The report included multiple instances of sightings and concluded the possibility of missile or rocket tests.
witness description: Guard at Seal Beach Naval Depot
